amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease appropriations for the Veterans Health Administration - Medical Services - HUD-VA Supportive Housing (HUD-VASH) program by $1,000,000 to encourage local VA systems and public housing authorities to work together to streamline the voucher application process to reduce barriers for veterans seeking housing assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
